# Agentic AI Synthesis Dashboard

A news aggregator that scrapes Hacker News and major tech blogs for Agentic AI updates. It uses AI to synthesize multiple sources into cohesive daily summaries, preventing redundant reading.

## Guidance

The tool must prioritize cross-source synthesis over individual article summaries. It should be delivered via a web dashboard.

## Tech Stack

Python, LangChain
